marklogic.body: This is one thing I can't figure out yet and it does happen all over the world. The bullies themselves don't get into any trouble but the instant the victims decide to stand up for themselves, they suspended or sent to counseling and told that they are the problem. Are the bullies really under the radar or is it that school admin just accepts a certain level of violence and doesn't appreciate the victims increasing it and forcing them to by hitting back? In any case, I Glad for your nephew and I hope he don't Burn up with resentment at being treated unfairly.
